title: T206 Chase for sale or trade
author: buymycards

posts.post_title: T206 Chase for sale or trade
posts.post_content:
Hi Boys and Girls,
I have a sweet T206 Chase that I would like to trade for one or two low grade Louisiana issues.  I am looking for any D or T cards from Louisiana, except for Coupon Type 2's.

The card is for sale for $90 shipped.  Any form of payment is fine.


Please use the PM function through N54.  Thanks, Rick
